articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of Unhasu Orchestra 
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, enjoyed concert "The Hearts Following the Sun" commemorating the Day of the Shining Star given by the Unhasu Orchestra.
					 After the national anthem was played, the audience observed a moment's silence in memory of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 When the image of tender-hearted Kim Jong Il appeared on the background of the stage of the concert which began with chorus "Smile of Love", the whole audience stood up all at once and broke into enthusiastic applause.
					
					  Put on the stage were serial songs of immortal masterpieces "Embrace of Country" and "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee", female solo and pangchang "The Place the General Indicated", chorus "Straight", mixed quartet and pangchang "We Will Resemble the General," chorus "We Advance to Continue the March of Mt. Paektu" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the unbounded yearning for Kim Jong Il, who led the revolutionary cause of Juche along the road of one victory after another.
					
					 In trombone solo and chorus "Thinking of the General", chorus "Yearning Is Boundless" and other numbers the performers emphasized the facts that the Korean people could fully demonstrate the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation thanks to Kim Jong Il's long journeys for the Songun revolution and it was thanks to all sorts of sufferings he underwent that they could enjoy happiness and joy.
					
					 The performance reached a climax as narration and orchestral music "Tears of Korea" began.
					
					 The audience was moved to tears, thinking of Kim Jong Il, who built the DPRK into a great socialist power of Songun based on single-minded unity and bid last farewell to the nation, amid a heavy fall of snow after making troublesome journeys along mountain ridges for the country and its people. 
					
					 As the concert was over, Kim Jong Un warmly waved to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience.
					
					 He highly appreciated their successful performance, expressing great satisfaction over the splendid performance which may instill strength and courage into the service personnel and people.
					
					 He set forth tasks which would serve as guidelines for art creative activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, U Tong Chuk and other officials of party, state and armed forces organs, service personnel of the KPA and people from all walks of life and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of So Man Sul
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of So Man Sul
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and people of the DPRK, Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of So Man Sul, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, expressing deep condolences over his death.  
					 So Man Sul was a deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly and Labour Hero of the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Pro-Japanese Remarks Condemned
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Pro-Japanese Remarks Condemned 
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea Friday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA in connection with the disclosure of the truth behind pro-Japanese remarks made by south Korea's Lee Myung Bak on Tok Islets.
					 WikiLeaks recently disclosed that when Fukuda, the then Japanese prime minister, said in July 2008 that Tok Islets would be written as part of Japan's territory in the new guidelines on teaching social subjects in primary and secondary schools of Japan, traitor said, "Wait for a little as it is difficult now."
					
					 This issue was opened to public by Japanese newspapers at that time, stirring up a big furor in south Korea. But the Lee Myung Bak regime stubbornly insisted he never made such remarks, glossing over the issue.
					
					 But the truth about his remarks have been undeniably confirmed as a U.S. diplomatic cable disclosed the specific contents of Lee's remarks which the then first secretary of the south Korean embassy in Tokyo conveyed to an official concerned of the U.S. embassy in Tokyo and his words that he felt feelings of perfidy when hearing those remarks.
					
					 In this connection opposition parties and personages of various social strata in south Korea are scathingly condemning the traitor, saying that the rumor afloat four years ago proved to be truth and it is nonsensical and deplorable that the remarks little short of abandoning Tok Islets were made by him. Media are also making a big uproar.
					
					 The pro-Japanese treacherous remarks made by Lee amount to an official promise made by him before his master that he would abandon the sovereignty over Tok Islets, part of the inviolable territory of the Korean nation from the historical and geographical points of view, and hand them over to Japan when the time comes.
					
					 This is sparking off towering resentment among all Koreans as it is a despicable sycophantic and treacherous act little short of what "the five traitors of 1905" did as they sold off the country to Japanese imperialism 100 odd years ago.
					
					 Looking back on history, the Lee group has drawn water to Japan's mill for reinvasion of Korea by conniving at and encouraging the Japanese reactionaries in their moves to grab the islets through its disgraceful diplomacy of submission to Japan and pro-Japanese sycophancy and treachery ever since it came to power.
					
					 Whenever they marked the islets as part of Japan's territory in the white paper for defense and committed such brigandish act as distorting history textbooks, the Lee group has never properly taken issue with those practices with a vague attitude, asserting that "south Korea should not be involved in a dispute" and it is better to conduct "quiet diplomacy" and exercise "self-restraint".  When the south Korean Maritime Institute was to set up the Tok Islets General Maritime Scientific Base, the group forced it to delete the expression of Tok Islets from the name, saying it may get on Japan's nerves.
					
					 Last year it did not hesitate to commit such treachery as opening Ullung Islet close to Tok Islets under the pretext of "tourism" to the Japanese reactionaries keen to stretch out tentacles of reinvasion of Ullung Islet in a bid to grab Tok Islets at any cost.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are now becoming all the more arrogant in their moves to grab Tok Islets due to such pro-Japanese treacherous acts of the Lee group.
					
					 His pro-Japanese remarks are unpardonable treacherous crimes as they reveal once again before the world the despicable true colors as the worst traitor.
					
					 The world does not know such vicious traitor as Lee who is resorting to pro-Japanese and pro-U.S. sycophantic acts while standing in confrontation with fellow countrymen with swords and yielding to the sworn enemy of the nation.
					
					 It is impossible for the south Korean people to escape disasters nor is it possible for the nation to escape misfortune as long as the group of sycophants and traitors are allowed to stay in power.
					
					 The south Korean people have already dealt a sledge hammer blow at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 The group would be well advised to bear in mind that only the nation's stern judgment awaits the group engrossed in sycophantic and treacherous acts and confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Social Scientists Society of Korea Denounces Unjust Move of Japanese Authorities
articles.content:
Social Scientists Society of Korea Denounces Unjust Move of Japanese Authorities
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Social Scientists Society of Korea Friday issued a statement as regards the fact that the Japanese customs authorities rummaged the luggage of the members of the delegation of the Japanese organization for the study of the Juche idea who returned home after visiting the DPRK and confiscated books and multimedia presentations they brought with them at the Kansai airport and the Haneda airport on Feb. 18.
					 Those confiscated were books, multimedia presentations and souvenirs they legally secured during their visit to the DPRK. So there is no reason whatsoever for them to be the objects of confiscation, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 So far a lot of personages of different countries visited Pyongyang and recorded the genuine appearances of the DPRK by themselves and brought with them lots of publications and souvenirs to their countries. But no country considered it as problematic.
					
					 Only Japanese authorities commit the aforesaid violence. 
					
					 This confiscation is an open oppression and anachronistic act against the progressive personages who want to study and spread the progressive idea which is displaying greater attraction day by day.
					
					 It will not flee from deserved denunciation as it is a manifestation of the unchanged hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 No power politics can block the desire of mankind for independence to sympathize with and follow the just ideology and idea.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should immediately stop the unjust move, mindful of the lesson drawn from the unanimous denunciation from progressive organizations and people across the world they deserved after they investigated the centers of the activities of the Japanese organizations for the study of the Juche idea including the secretariat of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and confiscated things in October 2001.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Kuwaiti Emir on Independence Day
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Kuwaiti Emir on Independence Day
 Pyongyang, February 24  (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message to Sheikh Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of Kuwait, congratulating him on the 51st anniversary of its independence and the 21st anniversary of its liberation.
					 The message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely hoping for security, stability, development and prosperity of Kuwait.

articles.title: Greetings to Kuwaiti Successor to Emir
articles.content:
Greetings to Kuwaiti Successor to Emir
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Nawaf Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, successor to the emir of Kuwait, on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of its independence and the 21st anniversary of its liberation.
					 The message sincerely wished the successor great success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Greetings to PM of Kuwait
articles.content:
Greetings to PM of Kuwait
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Thursday sent a message of greeting to Prime Minister of Kuwait Jaber Al Mubarak Al Hamad Al Sabah on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of its independence and the 21st anniversary of its liberation.
					 The message wished the prime minister great success in his work for the country's social stability and economic development.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the visiting delegation of Koreans in Japan for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 The delegation is led by Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan. 
					
					 Officials concerned attended the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Learns about Work at Coal Mining Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Learns about Work at Coal Mining Complex
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Friday learned about the work at the Anju Area Coal Mining Complex.
					 The officials and coal miners of the complex are registering signal successes every day in the drive for securing mining conditions with the firm determination to mark the centenary of birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the historic conference of the Workers' Party of Korea with a high degree of political enthusiasm and shining labor achievements.
					
					 He looked round various places of the complex to acquaint himself in detail with the coal production and operation of equipment. 
					
					 Then he held a consultative meeting of officials concerned.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the implementation of instructions given by leader Kim Jong Il during his field guidance and underscored the important role of the complex in economic construction.
					
					 It also took measures for supplying electricity on a regular basis and increasing the number of freight cars necessary for transporting prop timbers. It, at the same time, underscored the need for the relevant units to bring the command over production closer to the spot and ensure full operation of mining equipment.
					
					 Concluding the meeting, the premier underlined the need for all officials to pay deep attention to the living of the coal miners.

articles.title: Message from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Message from Russian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message from G. Zyuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The message said:
					
					 The dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 Today marks the 70th birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He devoted his whole life to the country and people.
					
					 His behests serve as a banner guiding the Korean people in their drive for the construction of socialist society.
					
					 Please accept my best regards.

articles.title: Syrian Charge d'Affaires a.i. Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Charge d'Affaires Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Syrian Charge d'Affaires a.i. Haissam Saad hosted a reception at his embassy on Friday to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Mun Song Mo, director of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Haissam Saad in his speech praised Kim Jong Il as an indomitable fighter who made tireless efforts for the country and people. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a nuclear state and demonstrated the might of the country on the world political arena, he added.
					
					 He hoped that the DPRK would achieve progress and prosperity under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il in idea, charisma and traits.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in his speech that the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il have successfully been inherited by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed the firm stand of the DPRK to value and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with Syria.

articles.title: DPRK-China Science and Technology Cooperation Committee Meets

DPRK-China Science and Technology Cooperation Committee Meets
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The 45th meeting of the DPRK-China Science and Technology Cooperation Committee was held in Beijing on Thursday.
					 Signed there was a protocol of the 45th meeting of the DPRK-China Inter-governmental Science and Technology Cooperation Committee.
					
					 Present there were the visiting DPRK delegation of the State Science and Technology Commission and officials of the Chinese Ministry of Science and Technology.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Treachery under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Treachery under Fire 
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The attempted act of south Korea's Lee Myung Bak to abandon claim to Tok Islets has evoked resentment from among the Korean people.
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with a section chief, Hwang Myong Chol and researcher Ju Song Chol at the History Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences.
					
					 Question: Some days ago, south Korea's Kyunghyang Daily News reportedly carried some part of a conversation held between Lee Myung Bak and former Japanese Prime Minister Yasuo Fukuda in July 2008.
					
					 As Fukuda said Japan was planning to mark the Tok Islets as its territory, Lee said, "It is untimely now. Please wait for a time being." What do you think about their conversation?
					
					 Hwang: Lee's remark means that he would recognize Japan's claim to the islets sooner or later. It is an absurd remark that can be made only by a traitor who takes no account of national interests. 
					
					 Even a secretary of the south Korean embassy in Tokyo confessed he felt a sense of betrayal towards traitor Lee.
					
					 In this regard, a councilor of the Japanese embassy in Seoul ridiculed that Lee had a face to gloss over such a kind of matter with no difficulty.
					
					 Ju: Tok Islets have belonged to the Korean territory from thousands of years ago.
					
					 It is shameless enough for traitor Lee to try to hand over the Tok Islets to Japan in return for trivial economic cooperation.
					
					 Such treachery was committed less than half a year after he came to power. Indeed, he is a traitor as good as the well-known five traitors of 1905.
					
					The Korean nation will surely force the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to pay dearly for its crimes.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides "Nuclear Security Summit" as Product of U.S.-S. Korea Conspiracy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides "Nuclear Security Summit" as Product of U.S.-S. Korea Conspiracy
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The "nuclear security summit" to be co-sponsored by the U.S., nuclear war mastermind, and south Korea, its servant, in Seoul is rejected by the international community.
					 It is illogical to discuss "nuclear security" in south Korea, a nuclear advance base for the U.S. and the world's biggest nuclear arsenal.
					
					 The world without nuclear weapons unanimously desired by humankind would have been unthinkable without the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war looms more on the Korean Peninsula than any other region of the world due to the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors. 
					
					 The U.S. turned south Korea into the world's most dangerous nuclear arsenal for the past more than half a century and has persistently attempted preemptive nuclear attacks on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime spread a rumor that the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula was "generated" by the DPRK's access to nukes and, therefore, the issue will naturally be settled if the DPRK dismantles nukes.
					
					 This is an expression of ignorance of the essence of the nuclear issue.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the peninsula stemmed from the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. and this matter has been taken up amid hostility.
					
					 Taking even a single step aside or back would mean a concession and lead to self-destruction as both sides level their nuclear weapons at the other side.
					
					 The DPRK has been exposed to the direct and longest nuclear threat in the world.
					
					 The U.S. included the DPRK in the "list of targets of preemptive nuclear attacks" in the "nuclear posture review" and turned south Korea into a nuclear war hotbed, posing constant nuclear threats to the Korean nation.
					
					 The DPRK has self-defensive nuclear deterrent and ranked itself among full-fledged nuclear weapons states. This helped end the nuclear imbalance on the Korean Peninsula and provided a guarantee for preventing a nuclear war and ensuring peace in Northeast Asia.
					
					 If the denuclearization issue of the Korean Peninsula is to be discussed, the nuclear threat posed to the other party should be substantially removed, to begin with.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea plan to start Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills days ahead of the "summit" with the involvement of sophisticated nuclear war means huge enough to fight a nuclear war. This is a clear proof of the nuclear threat posed to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are mistaken if they think they can draw public attention to their worn-out "theory of nuclear threat from the north" and justify the moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK with the "nuclear security summit" as a momentum.
					
					 They can never cover up their true colors as nuclear criminals.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary S. Korea's Claim for "Working Contact for Separated Families" Rebuffed
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary S. Korea's Claim for "Working Contact for Separated Families" Rebuffed
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is calling for "technical contacts for the reunion of separated families".
					 It is trying to convince the public that it is concerned about the "separated families issue".
					
					 This is another farce aimed to shirk the responsibilities for having escalated confrontation between fellow countrymen and plunged north-south ties into deadlock during its four years in office.
					
					 As recognized inside and outside, the Lee group is wholly to blame for completely undercutting the efforts for the humanitarian interactions that had been active between the north and the south after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 After taking office, the group, talking about "a lost decade", totally negated and blocked the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, cornerstone for improving the north-south relations and a landmark for national reunification.
					
					 Pursuant to the U.S. policy to stifle the DPRK, it escalated anti-DPRK smear psychological campaign and nuclear war drills in a phased manner and, not content with this, checked civilian meetings from the beginning by effecting the "May 24 measure."
					
					 The puppet group has constantly abducted or kidnapped Koreans on border areas or in the third countries. It also put into custody, appeased and pressed fishermen of the DPRK who went adrift in the sea for unexpected reasons, thereby creating more "separated families".
					
					 The confrontation maniacs and cursed human rights abusers are talking about "pains of separated families". This is an intolerable mockery and insult to all the Koreans including those families and relatives directly suffering from the separation.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the group of traitors plans "unofficial exchange and aid for separated families" via China and other channels under the signboard of "humanitarianism."
					
					 Its loud talk about "civilian-level reunion through a mediator or a third country" and "reinforcing relief fund" speaks volumes for its criminal nature.
					
					 This is aimed to abduct and kidnap more Koreans as an extension of the operations for creating "defectors from the north" and "surrenders" it had desperately carried out to "undermine" the DPRK for years.
					
					 It is clear that this will destroy the basics of humanitarian cooperation, to say nothing of the fundamentals of the north-south ties and furthermore, create more "separated families."
					
					 It is precisely for this reason that representatives of hundreds of political parties and organizations pressed the regime to overhaul its policy for a fundamental change in the south-north relations, claiming that the regime's moves for "switchover in policy toward the north" was a mere cosmetic.
					
					 If the Lee group is honestly interested in the humanitarian work such as reunion of separated families and relatives, it should officially apologize for its crimes before the Koreans in the north and the south and state to the world its willingness to implement the historic north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Authorities' Sinister Aim in Hosting "Nuclear Security Summit"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Authorities' Sinister Aim in Hosting "Nuclear Security Summit"
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are disgustingly behaving over the issue of the "nuclear security summit" to be held in Seoul in late March. They are vociferating about "nuclear threat from the north" and claiming "the summit would help the north", creating impression that the summit would provide a good opportunity for settling the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The summit is, in essence, no more than an unsavory burlesque to be staged by the U.S. and the south Korean conservative group in a bid to escalate a worldwide nuclear racket against the DPRK in conspiracy with each other.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should repent of what they have done to block the denuclearization of the peninsula and bring the danger of a nuclear war to the nation in collusion with outsiders before discussing "nuclear security", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 If substantial nuclear security and peace are to be achieved in the peninsula, it is necessary to put an end to the nuclear war threat from the U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces. To talk about nuclear security without taking the above-said measure is nothing but an empty talk.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the south Korean authorities in hosting the summit in league with the U.S. It is designed to make the already bankrupt theory of "nuclear threat from the north" sound real and justify their nuclear racket and moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 This is why the Lee Myung Bak group is going so busy making preparations for the summit while noisily advertising it. The "National Assembly" election will take place 15 days after the summit. The conservative group, in the grip of a serious ruling crisis after being cursed and forsaken by the people, is working hard to divert elsewhere public criticism of it and improve its image in a bid to escape a shameful defeat in the "election" with the summit as an occasion.
					
					 The Lee group is making desperate efforts to prolong its remaining days, clinging to the coattails of the U.S. but this is nothing but the last-ditch efforts to get rid of its predicament.
					
					 The Lee group had better stop foolishly talking about "nuclear security" but comply with public demand.

articles.title: Pyongyang Sports Team Bags 110 Gold Medals Last Year
articles.content:
Pyongyang Sports Team Bags 110 Gold Medals Last Year
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Sports Team in the DPRK won 110 gold medals last year.
					 Jong Chun Mi bagged one gold and two silver medals in the 2011 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					
					 Yun Un Hui and Kim Jin A came first in the women's 1 500m race at the international track-and-field tournament held in Taipei of China and in the women's 44kg category event of the 2011 Asian Youth and Juvenile Judo Championship respectively.
					
					 Kim Song Nam finished first in the men's singles of the Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament. 
					
					Footballers, marathoners and wrestlers also proved successful in international tournaments. 
					
					 The Team bagged gold medals in 30 odd events of the national championship and youth championship, with more than 130 players making good results in them.
					
					 Pyon Jong Ho, head of the Team, said that these results were thanks to the successful training of players and reserves. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Sports Team, found in April Juche 45 (1956), has produced many merited players, including Kim Chol Hwan, Kim Yong Sik, Kim Kwang Suk, Han Phil Hwa and Hong Un Jong.

articles.title: Kim Hyon Hui, Art Prodigy of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Hyon Hui, Art Prodigy of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyon Hui, a first-year girl pupil of Pyongyang Kallimgil Secondary School in the DPRK, is drawing attention of fine art experts as an art prodigy. 
					 Kim has been greatly interested in painting since her kindergarten days.
					
					 Ri Tong Hun, a teacher of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace who has taught her how to draw pictures over the last 6 years, told KCNA, "Hyon Hui has liked drawing what she saw in picture books and children's films since the age of five. Her drawings looked some awkward but reflected her inborn talent."
					
					 When she was six years old, Kim Hyon Hui won a special prize at a national art exhibition. Her pictures were also displayed at international children's art shows held in China, Russia, India, the Czech Republic, Egypt and some other countries to win high admiration.
					
					 In particular, some of her pictures were highly appreciated at an art show arranged as part of the exposition in China in May Juche 99 (2010.)
					
					 One of the viewers said, "I saw Kim drawing picture just before, but it is hard to believe that the excellent picture was drawn by a 10-year-old girl. I really admire the DPRK that trains such talents as her at state expenses." 
					
					 Typical of her recent pictures are "Day of Visit to Mangyongdae" and "In Ostrich Farm."

articles.title: Long Tradition of Korean Football
articles.content:
Long Tradition of Korean Football
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Korea has a long history in playing football. 
					 Korean people, dating back to Koguryo kingdom (277 B.C.-668 A.D.), were good at playing ball and young people of Silla kingdom used to enjoy ball game, according to historical records of Korea and China. 
					
					This folk game was called "Chukguk " in the period of the three kingdoms (Koguryo, Paekje and Silla). It would be played at a wide playground with netted poles on both sides where the two teams, each consisting of seven or eight players, competed with a leather ball.  
					
					 The historical facts go to prove that  "Chukguk" was a traditional folk game similar to modern football, rugby and basketball.  
					
					 It has been known that the folk game was played in 1897 when there was the first football tournament in Korea. 
					
					 Most of the players who took part in the first western football match, called "Chokgu", were from foreign language schools and interpreters serving at the royal palace. 
					
					 They learned sports as well as foreign languages from western teachers and later formed a football club, contributing to popularizing modern football in the country.

articles.title: Korean Writers, Artistes Commemorate Day of Shining Star in Tokyo
articles.content:
Korean Writers, Artistes Commemorate Day of Shining Star in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Korean writers and artistes in Japan revering general secretary Kim Jong Il took place at the Korean Publishing Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 11 to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star under the sponsorship of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan (Munyedong).
					 The participants included Kim Sang Il and Han Jong Suk, vice-chairpersons of the National Rights Committee of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Munyedong, chiefs of branches of Munyedong in different parts of Japan, artistes of the Kumgangsan Opera Troupe and the advisor of Munyedong in Kanto area.
					
					 Chairman Kim Jong Su, addressing the meeting, said Kim Jong Il took good care of the writers and artistes of Chongryon and led them along the path of glory.
					
					 He called on all participants to cherish the immortal feats performed by Kim Jong Il in guiding the work of Munyedong and make drastic changes in literary and art actiities for ushering in the golden days of Chongryon this year marking the 100th anniversary of birth of President Kim Il Sung under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The meeting was followed by an art performance given by artistes of the Kumgangsan Opera Troupe and members of Munyedong.
					
					 In the performance began with narration "The Country Shining with Eternal Sun", the artistes staged poem recital "We Have 'Song of General Kim Jong Il'", vocal solo "The General Is Eternal as the Sun", song and dance "Snowflake" and small Haegum solo "My Lovely Flower".

Installation of U.S. Base Opposed in Dominican Republic
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Progressive and leftwing organizations called for preventing the installation of a U.S. military base in Saona island, in the south west of the Dominican Republic.

articles.title: German Human Rights Czar Demands Guantanamo Closure
articles.content:
German Human Rights Czar Demands Guantanamo Closure 
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Germany on Monday called on the U.S. to close the prisoner camp on Guantanamo, according to press reports.

articles.title: Africa Makes Sustained Development in Economy Despite Difficult Situation
articles.content:
Africa Makes Sustained Development in Economy Despite Difficult Situation
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Africa's economic growth remained robust despite the difficult international situation.
					 Chairman of the African Union Commission (AUC) Jean Ping, addressing the 18th Summit of AU head of states and governments, said several countries registered average economic growth in 2011 exceeding five and six percents even reaching double digit growth.
					
					 In 2010 the African economy recorded an increase of 4.7 percent.
					
					 Especially, Nigeria, Angola and Uganda registered 8-9 percent growth in their economic development.
					
					 Experts say the success is ascribable to the fact that the African nations cooperated with each other and tapped all their local economic potentials, free from their old method of economic management that depends on others.
					
					 President of Angola Jose Eduardo Dos Santos underscored the need to build a new economic order in Africa to remove the trade barrier among nations and develop the infrastructure.
					
					 South African President Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma said African nations could no longer live on the relief fund, underlining the need to eradicate poverty by their own efforts, that is, by working hard.
					
					 Countries of the continent have come up with practical measures for laying a self-reliant economic foundation for sustained growth.
					
					 To this end, they channeled primary efforts into settling the power and water shortage and developing the infrastructure including roads, bridges and railways.
					
					 East African nations set a goal of increasing the present electric-power production as much as ten times to meet the growing demand for power and planned to complete the power grid for East Africa till 2014.
					
					 Nigeria built a hydroelectric power station capable of generating 30 000kw in Kaduna State and Algeria laid a 750km-long pipeline for drinking water in a desert area.
					
					 Tanzania is set to embark on building several roads according to the government's plan for building infrastructure.
					
					 The African nations are also paying due attention to diversifying their economy so as to increase the productivity and ensure the high quality of products. 
					
					 The Ghanaian government made public a state plan for developing exports aimed at increasing industrial products, handicrafts, etc., while overcoming tendency of putting emphasis on the export of agricultural products. 
					
					 The government of Zimbabwe added to its Mineral Law an item on processing minerals in the homeland and exporting them and developing the ore-dressing industry, discarding the old method of exporting minerals.
					
					 Kenya and many other African nations have set up special economic zones with an eye to stepping up the industrialization.

articles.title: U.S. Stretches out Its Tentacles into Asia-Pacific Region
articles.content:
U.S. Stretches Out Its Tentacles into Asia-Pacific Region
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is stretching out tentacles of domination into the Asia-Pacific region to realize its wild ambition for world domination. 
					 In November last year the U.S. sponsored the summit of the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) for the first time in 18 years and Obama took part in the East-Asia summit for the first time as the U.S. president. There he said that Asia is a region where the U.S. has primary interests.
					
					 At the same time, the secretary of Defense and the secretary of State and other high-ranking authorities traveled Asian countries and made much fuss about the "necessity" of cooperation and the "importance" of the U.S.
					
					 The black-hearted intention of the U.S. was fully disclosed through a new report on military strategy issued in last January.
					
					 In the report the U.S. clarified that it would decrease the number of armed forces in Europe while making a switchover to increasing the military presence in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 According to it, the U.S. reached an agreement with Australia to keep its 250 U.S. marines in that country and increase the number of forces to 1 000 in 2014 and 2 500 in 2016. Australia also agreed to let U.S. warships carrying fighters and nuclear weapons use its military base.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, the chief of operation of the U.S. Navy underscored the necessity to deploy it in the world and declared that it is pushing forward a detailed plan to deploy new type warships in Singapore and Philippines in a few years to come.
					
					 Worse still, the U.S. recently staged large-scale joint military exercises in the Asia-Pacific region one after another, causing instability and sparking off an arms race in the region.
					
					 The Xinhua News Agency said that joint military exercises with noisy gunfire are disturbing the stability in the Asia-Pacific region, adding that they are pursuant to long-term strategic aim of the U.S.  It also criticized the U.S. for escalating the tension through this saber-rattling in a bid to maintain and strengthen its hegemonic position in the Asia-Pacific region and realize its strategic ambition for world domination.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. craftily seeks to establish economic domination over the countries in the region.
					
					 As part of the plan, the U.S. came out with the TPP and is trying to force it on the countries in the region.
					
					 The TPP is, in essence, an agreement advantageous to the U.S. as it is premised on liberalization of trade, agriculture, manufacturing industry, service, etc. and even the removal of not only tariff barrier but also tariff-free barrier in bilateral trade.
					
					 By keeping markets of countries in the Asia-Pacific region fully open through this agreement so it may get access to them, unhindered, the U.S. seeks to put the key branches of economy in the region under its control.
					
					 The facts clearly prove that the U.S. remains unchanged in its wild ambition for domination and its true colors as an aggressor.

articles.title: American Society Ridden with Contradiction and Corruption
articles.content:
American Society Ridden with Contradiction and Corruption 
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- There are two different realities in the United States which provide a clear proof of social contraction and corruption there.
					 People are staging demonstrations in protest against the capitalist system which forces poverty and non-rights on an overwhelming majority of the population while a tiny handful of presidential candidates are busy collecting a fabulous amount of money to win the election.
					
					 The Anti-Wall Street demos in the U.S. are unabated this year, too.
					
					 On Jan. 17 there was a protest against the unpopular policy of a tiny handful of ruling forces and the greed of monopoly plutocrats in Washington.
					
					 Some days later, many citizens in San Francisco took to the streets and cursed the American society that caused a miserable reality in which overwhelming majority of toiling masses are unable to live in their own houses.
					
					 Citizens in Washington D.C. and Oakland of California staged demos in protest against the capitalists' unlimited avarice and offered strong resistance against the riot police.
					
					 The waves of demos against capitalism that swept across the U.S. clearly show the social contradictions deeply rooted in its society.
					
					 This is well illustrated by the results of the opinion poll conducted by an institution of the U.S. 66 percent of the respondents said that "serious contradictions exist between the poor and the rich."
					
					 Against the background of the ever-deepening social contradictions presidential candidates are locked in a hot scramble in the U.S. with the election due in November this year. They are busy collecting more election funds to occupy Presidency.
					
					 According to the amount of election money collected by the candidates in the first three months ending January this year made public by the Federal Election Commission late in January, the incumbent president accumulated about 40 million U.S. dollars, topping the list. Candidate from the Republican Party Mitt Romney collected 24 million U.S. dollars while Newt Gingrich, former speaker of the House of Representatives, collected 9.8 million U.S. dollars.
					
					 As seen above, the tiny handful of ruling quarters are vying with each other to collect election money to seek presidential office, turning a deaf ear to the voices of the toiling masses demanding jobs and bread. This reality glaringly proves that the U.S. has no future.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Scheduled Effectuation of FTA Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Scheduled Effectuation of FTA Censured
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of south Korea's All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the South Korea-U.S. FTA held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 22.

They also railroaded the "motion calling for the ratification of the proposal for the FTA" despite people's strong opposition, it said.

					 The headquarters would stage an all-people action on Feb. 25 to prevent the FTA from taking effect and have it retracted through more powerful movement, it declared.
					
					 They would surely punish Lee Myung Bak, the ruling party and their followers who quenched the people's will, it said.
					
					 They called for having FTA, a treacherous and fabricated agreement, scrapped with immediate effect and preventing it from being put into force as it took no account into the people's livelihood and mindset.
					
					 They also appealed to the infuriated people to resolutely check FTA.

articles.title: Actions for Judging Group of Traitors Declared in S. Korea

Actions for Judging Group of Traitors Declared in S. Korea

articles.title: Processed Stones Widely Used in Decorating Buildings in Korea
articles.content:
Processed Stones Widely Used in Decorating Buildings in Korea
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A variety of processed stones have been widely applied to decorating buildings in Korea.
					 Typical of the buildings are the State Theatre and the Solar Equipment Centre with handrails, balusters, floors and walls decorated with processed stones, adding figurative arts to them. 
					
					 In particular, processed granite and marvel largely help buildings get modern aesthetic sense.
					
					 Patterned stone decorations and craftworks are also attractions in buildings.
					
					 The Chonji Center is a major producer of building materials and stones in the country.
					
					 A section chief of the centre, Ri Myong Ho, told KCNA that the center boasts of high-level abilities of developing technologies and products.

articles.title: Nothing Is Expected from Lee Myung Bak "Government": S. Korean Papers
articles.content:
Nothing Is Expected from Lee Myung Bak "Government": S. Korean Papers
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- South Korean Kyunghyang Daily News Wednesday carried an editorial criticizing the "government" authorities for claiming they have registered what they called successes in four years of office.
					 The editorial recalled that on Feb. 21 Chongwadae issued a press release titled "Major achievements in economic field in four years of the Lee Myung Bak government."
					
					 Chongwadae was so shameless as to delete contents unfavorable to Lee Myung Bak from the press release and tell lies to give impression that everything went well, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 This gave a glimpse of Chongwadae's attitude far from the people's grudge against the "government".
					
					 The press release referred to the improved protection of irregular jobs and the improved quality of employment and described them as "great achievements", turning its face away from the reduction in people's income, the widening gap between the poor and rich, serious unemployment, etc. 
					
					 Recalling that the press release falsified truth by claiming that the price hike was attributable not to the authorities' policy but to the jump in the prices of raw and other materials, the editorial said this was an artifice to hoodwink the people.
					
					 It did not mention even the tax cut for the rich and the project of the four big rivers, the core of the Lee Myung Bak's economic policy.
					
					 There is nothing to expect from the Lee regime as Chongwadae is lavishing praises on it though it should have seriously reflected on the present situation and buckled down to carrying out the policy for stabilizing the people's livelihood.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Shows Held in China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Shows Held in China
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia shows took place in Dalian, Shenyang and Kunming of China to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 The venues of the shows were crowded with visitors every day, their number totaling tens of thousands from Feb. 14 to 21.
					
					 Seeing Kimjongilias in full bloom, reflection of boundless reverence of all people for Kim Jong Il, the visitors praised him.
					
					 The president of a flowering tree company in Dalian said that every Kimjongilia reflects reverence of the Chinese for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general manger of the company stressed that Kimjongilia is a famous flower. This beautiful flower represents the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man, he added.
					
					 The director of the Forestry Bureau of Dalian City said the more he sees Kimjongilia, a famous flower recognized in world floriculture, the more it looks beautiful and attractive.
					
					 The secretary general of the Dalian Floriculture Association said that it is a pride of Dalian to have Kimjongilia in bloom which was awarded top prizes in world horticulture exhibitions and flower shows and it will always remain in bloom in Dalian City.
					
					 The general manger of a Shenyang port transportation company said that the wonderful and beautiful Kimjongilia is blooming red in the hearts of progressives.
					
					 The director of the International Department of the Shenyang City Center for External Scientific and Technological Exchange noted that he was deeply moved to see the show and keenly realized how much the world progressives are praising Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general manager of the Dandong Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse said that the show provided an opportunity for praising the great feats Kim Jong Il performed for the development of the Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The deputy general manager of the World Yunnan Expo. Horticulture Co. Ltd said that thousands of people visited the venue of the show in Kunming on a daily basis, an expression of profound trust of the Chinese in Kim Jong Il, adding that Kimjongilia, flower of the sun, will always be in full bloom in the hearts of mankind.

articles.title: Day of Defenders of Motherland Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Defenders of Motherland Marked in Russia 
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Russia marked Day of Defenders of the Motherland with colorful events.
					 Russian President Dmitri Medvedev laid a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier outside the Kremlin on Thursday.
					
					 The wreath-laying ceremony was attended by Prime Minister Vladimir Putin, Defence Minister Anatoly Serzhukov, speakers of both Houses and veterans of the great Patriotic war. 
					
					 This was followed by a ceremony of awarding the title of honored soldier city to Lomonosov, Kovrov, Takanlog and Petropavlovsk-Kamchatski.
					
					 A meeting of congratulating war veterans and meritorious fighters, consolatory visits to them, military parade, celebration demonstration, concert, sports games and other colorful events took place in the capital and cities including Sankt-Petersburg on the same day. Fireworks were displayed in the sky over the cities in the evening.
					
					 There was an evening gala in Moscow on Feb. 22.
					
					 Speaking there, the Russian president expressed thanks to those who took part in battles and work during the war period. It is important to carry forward the brave tradition of soldiers, he added. 
					
					 The state security is now faced with fresh challenges and the world is still in a grip of the tendency to resort to the armed forces, he said, adding this arouses concern. 
					
					 It is important for all the countries to have defence capabilities, he noted, stressing that Russia needs perfect and powerful armed forces. This is not just a matter of necessity but an issue related to the existence of the country, he added.

articles.title: DPRK Guarantees Peace by Dint of Military Might
articles.content:
DPRK Guarantees Peace by Dint of Military Might
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities have launched a combined anti-submarine exercise jointly with U.S. forces in the sea off Kunsan, followed by a firing drill in the West Sea.
					 The Korean People's Army (KPA) is now keeping a close eye on the exercise, ready to strongly react to any attack.
					
					 The KPA has always and reliably defended the security of the country and the gains of revolution from enemy's provocations.
					
					 Its invincible might was once demonstrated during the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					
					 The United States mobilized its huge armed forces equipped with latest weaponry into the Korean War, along with troops of 15 satellite states, the south Korean army and even the Japanese militarists.
					
					 But, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the KPA overpowered the invaders, winning the war. 
					
					 In 1968 when the U.S. imperialists were threatening the DPRK with "war" and "retaliation" over the captured U.S. spying ship "Pueblo", it smashed their arrogant attempts, declaring that it would return retaliation for retaliation and total war for total war.
					
					 In the period of the arduous march, the forced march, when the country was in hard time, the KPA frustrated U.S.-led imperialists' anti-DPRK war moves by dint of military force.
					
					 Now it boasts of a powerful war deterrent and striking capabilities.
					
					 Peace of the Korean Peninsula is guaranteed by the KPA military strength based on the Songun (military-first) policy.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Hail Decision on Conferring Title of Generalissimo on Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Hail Decision on Conferring Title of Generalissimo on Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Feb. 16 as regards the publication of the decision on awarding the DPRK title of Generalissimo to general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The decision on awarding the DPRK title of Generalissimo to Kim Jong Il is an expression of boundless reverence and praise of him who strengthened the Korean People's Army founded by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and performed the undying feats in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of socialist Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into an unbreakable socialist power with his gifted intelligence, matchless grit and outstanding commanding art.
					
					 He made a great contribution to defending peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world by pursuing the Songun politics. 
					
					 Upon hearing the news that the decision was published, we are sharing this joy with the Korean people, friends of the DPRK and Juche idea followers of the world.

articles.title: News of Commemorations of Day of Shining Star in DPRK Reported by Russia Media
articles.content:
News of Commemorations of Day of Shining Star in DPRK Reported by Russia Media
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Russian media released commemorative reports between Feb. 15 and 17 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					  Zentr TV aired a program three times that the Korean people were commemorating the Day of the Shining Star, showing the dear respected Kim Jong Un present at the national meeting commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il erected at the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Gubernia TV of Khabarovsk Territory showed at its prime time scenes on the boundless reverence of the Korean army and people for him with photos on his sacred revolutionary life and undying feats.
					
					 The Vostok Media and Internet News Asiatski Reporter              
					
					aired a program several times that Korean servicepersons of three services held a solemn ceremony to make public a joint decision on renaming the Kumsusan Memorial Palace the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, pay respects to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and pledge loyalty to Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un in his presence.

The article praised the undying feats the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander performed by protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: News of Generalissimo Title to Kim Jong Il Reported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
News of Generalissimo Title to Kim Jong Il Reported by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The news that the DPRK title of Generalissimo was awarded to general secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary was reported by foreign media on Feb. 15 and 16.

He further strengthened the Korean People's Army which was founded by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and had followed the road of victory and glory, creditably defended the destiny of the socialist country and the nation and performed undying feats for the world peace and stability.

					 It continued: He turned the DPRK into a military power and led the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. to victory with his Songun politics, performing undying feats. He also made the DPRK rank itself among the nuclear states and emerge a satellite producer and launcher.

articles.title: Work Published in Guinea
articles.content:
Work Published in Guinea
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the La Soldarite Publishing House of Guinea.

					 The work deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Brief History of Kim Jong Il Carried by Bulletin of Kuwaiti Organizations
articles.content:
Brief History of Kim Jong Il Carried by Bulletin of Kuwaiti Organizations

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Ecuador
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea on the theme of "The great Comrade Kim Jong Il's undying feats and Juche idea" was held in Ecuador on Feb. 16, his birth anniversary.
					 Displayed in its venue were his works and books on the DPRK in which the Juche idea has been successfully applied.
					
					 Present there were Milton Burbano Borquez, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea who is chairman of the Ecuadorian National Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung, Fernando Maldonado, member of the National Executive Committee of the Socialist Party-Ample Front of Ecuador, Julio Ballesteros Espin, chairman of the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People, and other political and public figures and Juche idea followers.

					 The speakers said that he turned the DPRK into an indestructible socialist power which is high in dignity thanks to independence and demonstrates its might with Songun by successfully applying the Juche idea to revolutionary practice.
					
					 The greatest feat performed by him was that he developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea and pursued the original Songun politics, defending peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world, they stressed.
					
					 They noted that the Korean people will always emerge victorious in the Songun revolution under the outstanding leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the great successor to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They expressed support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Plaque of Kim Jong Il Class Unveiled in Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Plaque of Kim Jong Il Class Unveiled in Zimbabwe
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The plaque of Kim Jong Il Class was unveiled with due ceremony at Primary School 2 in Kuwazana, Zimbabwe on Feb. 16, his birth anniversary.
					 Carved on the red marble plaque on a pedestal are letters bearing "Kim Jong Il Class, February 16, 2012".
					
					 The principal of the school told the ceremony that Kim Jong Il wisely led the party, army and people of the DPRK, performing undying feats on behalf of the country and its people, the times and history.
					
					 The Korean and other progressive people are praising Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician, peerlessly political elder, Songun brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, peerless patriot and benevolent father of the people, the principal said.
					
					 An art performance was given by pupils of the school at the ceremony.

articles.title: Joint Performance Given in Russia to Commemorate Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Joint Performance Given in Russia to Commemorate Birth Anniversary
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A joint performance was given by the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Eastern Military District of Russia and the DPRK Mission in Khabarovsk at the Officers' Hall of the district on Feb. 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were officials of the Office of the Presidential Envoy to the Far East Region of the Russian Federation, the mission of the Foreign Ministry in Khabarovsk, the Khabarovsk Territory Government, the Khabarovsk Territory Legislative Assembly, the Khabarovsk City Administration, the Eastern Military District, the Far Eastern Railway Bureau, the Far Eastern Interior General Bureau, the Far Eastern Region Extraordinary Situation Center, the "United Russia" Party, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, "A Just Russia", the Khabarovsk Territory Russia-DPRK Friendship Association and media, citizens of Khabarovsk, the DPRK deputy consul-general and consuls in Khabarovsk and officials in the field of economy of the DPRK working in Russia.
					
					 The performance began with chorus of the song and dance ensemble "Song of General Kim Jong Il", an immortal revolutionary paean. Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as Korean song "General, Here Is the Forefront" and Russian song "A Flock of Cranes".
					
					 Alexandr Levintal, deputy presidential envoy to the Far East Region of the Russian Federation, said that "Song of General Kim Jong Il" is such a famous song that the more one hears, the more keenly one realizes his personality as a great man.
					
					  "All the songs of the two countries put on the stage today fully reflect the reverence of the Korean and Russian peoples for Kim Jong Il, I think," he added. "I was deeply moved to see the whole audience singing in chorus with applause when 'Song of General Kim Jong Il' was resounded."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a presenciar concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a presenciar concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu
 Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, presencio el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu "Alma que sigue al sol" en homenaje al Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					 Luego de interpretado el "Himno Nacional", los espectadores guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente.
					
					 Cuando aparecio en el fondo de la escena, que abrio el telon con el coro "Sonrisa de amor", la imagen generosa del Dirigente, todos los espectadores aplaudieron efusivamente poniendose de pie.
					
					 En la escena se presentaron las canciones en serie conocidas como obras maestras "Regazo de la Patria" y "Corea, te hare grande", el solo y pangchang (coro del foso) femeninos "El lugar indicado por el General", el coro "Directo", el cuarteto mixto y pangchang "Me parecere al General", el coro "Continuamos la marcha iniciada en el Paektu" y otras piezas.
					
					 Los artistas expresaron los testimonios de gran anoranza y veneracion al Dirigente quien condujo la causa revolucionaria del Juche por la senda de victorias.
					
					 En el solo de trombon y el coro "Pienso en el General", el coro "Anoranza es infinita" y otras piezas, describieron con voz sonora que gracias al largo camino de abnegacion del Dirigente para conducir la revolucion del Songun, crecieron la dignidad y el poderio de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y llegaron la felicidad y la alegria del pueblo coreano a cambio de las pruebas y dificultades sufridas por el.
					
					 El concierto llego al climax con la narracion y musica orquestal "Lagrimas de Corea".
					
					 Los espectadores no pudieron contener las lagrimas pensando en el Dirigente quien convirtio la RPDC en la potencia del Songun, pais unido monoliticamente y paraiso socialista, hizo todo lo posible por la patria y el pueblo y estuvo bajo las nevadas hasta el dia en que fue despedido por el pueblo coreano.
					
					 Terminado el concierto, Kim Jong Un respondio cordialmente a las aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					 Evaluo altamente la exitosa funcion, muy satisfecho de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido este concierto magnifico que puede redoblar el animo y coraje del ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					 Presento las tareas que serviran de guia en la creacion artistica.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, U Tong Chuk y otros cuadros de los organos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los habitantes capitalinos de diversos sectores y los universitarios.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak insulta a familiares separados, insiste ACNC
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak insulta a familiares separados, insiste ACNC
 Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak suelta mentiras como "contacto de experto para el encuentro de los familiares separados" solo con el fin de inducir la opinion publica como si prestara atencion a este problema.
					 Es otra farsa para evadir la responsabilidad de la confrontacion fratricida y empeoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, que son productos de la politica maligna de Lee durante 4 anos de su mandato.
					
					 Como es conocido por el interior y exterior del pais, precisamente debido a las maniobras de confrontacion de Lee anti-RPDC, se congelaron y se empeoraron todas las cooperaciones humanitarias en activo funcionamiento entre ambas partes coreanas despues del 15 de Junio.
					
					 Despues de tomar el poder Lee lanzo disparate de los "10 anos perdidos", nego totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, cimiento del desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas y jalon de la reunificacion de la patria e impidio por completo su ejecucion.
					
					 Obedeciendo a la politica de EE.UU. de aplastamiento a la RPDC, amplio de modo escalonado la guerra psicologica y los ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra esta y reprimio cruelmente el movimiento para el encuentro civico en virtud de la "medida de 24 de mayo".
					
					 Perpetro de continuo el secuestro de los compatriotas en la linea fronteriza con la RPDC y en el tercero pais y fabrico nuevos "familiares separados" deteniendo, conciliando y coerciendo a los naufragos de la RPDC.
					
					 Los traidores a la nacion enloquecidos en la confrontacion, criminales antieticos hablan de la "tristeza de los familiares separados", lo que es una burla y insulto intolerable a toda la nacion inclusive a las familiares y parientes separados que sufren el dolor de la division territorial.
					
					 Lo que no puede pasar por alto es que la banda traidora de Lee trata de "apoyar el intercambio no oficial de los familiares separados" a traves de China y otros paises bajo el rotulo de "humanitarismo".
					
					 "Encuentro a nivel civil a traves de intermediario y tercer pais" y "incremento de cuota de apoyo", de que hablan ellos, revelan fehacientemente su naturaleza criminal.
					
					 Siendo una prolongacion de la operacion de formar "fugitivos del Norte" y "desertor" cometidos siniestramente en el pasado para la "desintegracion del interior del Norte", es un crimen antihumanitario tendente a cometer abiertamente el secuestro de cuno internacional contra sus compatriotas.
					
					 Todo esto destruira aun mas los el fundamento de las relaciones N-S y las bases de la cooperacion humanitaria y producira mas los "familiares separados".
					
					 Por lo tanto, en estos dias, los representantes de cientos de partidos politicos y entidades y medios de prensa demandan categoricamente reexaminar la politica a favor del cambio radical de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas calificando de una simulacion el movimiento para el "cambio de la politica sobre el Norte" del "gobierno".
					
					 Si la banda de Lee tiene el sincero interes en las labores humanitarias tales como el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados, debe pedir disculpa oficial ante toda la nacion del Norte y el Sur por sus crimenes cometidos antes y exponer su voluntad de ejecutar las historicas declaraciones conjuntas.

articles.title: EE.UU. trata de dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico
articles.content:
EE.UU. trata de dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico
 Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos extiende sus negras garras de dominio a  la region de Asia-Pacifico en el marco de realizar su ambicion de dominar el mundo.
					 En noviembre del ano pasado, EE.UU. patrocino al cabo de 18 anos la Cumbre de APEC (Cooperacion Economica de Asia-Pacifico) y Obama participo por primera vez como presidente estadounidense en la Cumbre de Asia Oriental, ocasion en la cual subrayo que Asia es la region a que presta interes primordial EE.UU.
					
					 Coincidiendo con esto, el secretario de Defensa, la secretaria de Estado y otros funcionarios de alto rango hicieron gira por los paises asiaticos, exponiendo la "necesidad" de la cooperacion y la importancia de "EE.UU." en esta region.
					
					 La intencion malsana del imperio quedo revelada fehacientemente a traves del nuevo informe de la estrategia militar publicado en enero del ano en curso.
					
					 El documento aclara evidentemente que EE.UU. se dirige a intensificar la existencia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico en vez de reducir sus fuerzas armadas estacionadas en Europa.
					
					 Segun lo estipulado, EE.UU. y Australia llegaron a un acuerdo de acantonar en el segundo este ano 250 marineros norteamericanos, aumentar su numero en 2014 a mil y en 2016 a 2 mil 500 y de que las cazas y los buques norteamericanos con cazas y armas nucleares puedan utilizar la base militar de Australia.
					
					 Ademas, el jefe del departamento de operacion de las fuerzas navales norteamericano hablo de la necesidad de desplegar y mantener por doquier del mundo las fuerzas navales y de que impulsa el detallado plan para colocar dentro de unos anos proximos los buques de guerra modernos en Singapur y Filipinas.
					
					 Para colmo, en estos dias, EE.UU. desarrolla sucesivamente en la region de Asia-Pacifico los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura, creando la inestabilidad y fomentando la carrera armamentista.
					
					 La Agencia china Xinhua revelo que EE.UU. desarrolla en el marco de su meta estrategica a largo plazo los ejercicios militares conjuntos destruyendo asi la estabilidad de la region de Asia-Pacifico. Critico que al crear la situacion tensa con tales simulacros, EE.UU. trata de mantener y fortalecer su posicion principal en esta region y realizar su ambicion estrategica de dominar al mundo.
					
					 Por otra parte, el imperio maniobra astutamente para establecer el dominio economico en los paises de esta region.
					
					 Como un eslabon de su maniobra, EE.UU. presento la iniciativa de colaboracion transpacifica (TPP en ingles) y pretende a imponerla a los paises regionales.
					
					 La TPP es, en su esencia, un acuerdo unilateralmente favorable a EE.UU. porque esta toma como premisa realizar la liberalizacion en el comercio, la agricultura, la industria elaboradora, el servicio y eliminar tanto la barrera aduanera como no aduanera en el comercio mutuo.
					
					 A traves de este acuerdo, EE.UU. trata de dejar abiertos por completo los mercados de los paises de la region para facilitar su entrada alli y de esta manera controlar las arterias economicas de la  region.
					
					 La realidad demuestra claramente que nunca se cambian la ambicion dominacionista y la naturaleza agresiva de EE.UU.

articles.title: Premier coreano visita el complejo carbonifero de Anju
articles.content:
Premier coreano visita el complejo carbonifero de Anju
 Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim averiguo el dia 24 en el terreno las gestiones del Complejo Carbonifero de la Zona de Anju.
					 Con la determinacion de acoger con gran entusiasmo politico y notables exitos de trabajo el centenario del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre el complejo y la historica Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios y carboneros de esta empresa alcanzan diariamente exitos innovadores en su trabajo para preparar buenas condiciones de extraccion, 
					
					 Choe estuvo en varios puestos como la sala de mando general de la Mina de Carbon Hwaphung y la galeria Ryonson haciendo conocimiento del estado de produccion de carbon y el estado de funcionamiento de los equipos.
					
					 En la reunion de funcionarios correspondientes convocada por el, se hizo balance del cumplimiento de lo que habia instruido el Dirigente durante su visita de orientacion y se resalto la importancia de la tarea que tiene el complejo en la construccion economica.
					
					 Se tomaron las medidas para suministrar normalmente la electricidad de frecuencia estable y aumentar el numero de vagones para transportar la madera de entibo.
					
					 Igualmente, se exigio a las unidades vinculadas dirigir la produccion en los mismos centros de trabajo y poner en pleno funcionamiento los equipos de extraccion.
					
					 Finalmente, el premier destaco que todos los funcionarios deben prestar profunda atencion a las condiciones de vida de los carboneros.
